title: Cash-for-job scam: SC grants future bail to former WB min Partha Chatterjee | India News - Business Standard
selftext:
The top court said upon his release Chatterjee shall not hold any public office but can continue as MLA.

The bench said that a suspect cannot be detained indefinitely and, therefore, it has to balance the rights of the accused and the victims.

On December 4, the top court had reserved its verdict on his bail plea and told him that, "On the face of it you are a corrupt person. Crores of rupees were recovered from your premises."
